scripts.deploy-local: graph deploy --node http://localhost:8020/ --ipfs http://localhost:5001 --version-label v0.0.1 pag0/erc8004

scripts.deploy-local:bsc: graph deploy --node http://localhost:8020/ --ipfs http://localhost:5001 --version-label v0.0.1 pag0/erc8004-bsc subgraph-bsc.yaml
